metadata.source: Patel et al. (2016) KDE hotspot map (macro-regions approximated, then discretized into intersections using OSM graph)
metadata.notes: Each region is a macro hotspot. We will select n_points intersections inside radius_m from the OSM graph.

sampling_policy.notes: During incident generation: sample 80% from hotspot regions and 20% uniformly across the city for generalization.
